text: Joe Pavelski is an American profesional ice hockey player. He currently plays for the Dallas Stars of the National Hockey League (NHL) where he is the alternate captain. He has also played for the San Jose Sharks. He was the captain of the Sharks from 2015 until 2019. On July 1, 2019, he signed a three-year, $21 million contract with the Dallas Stars. Pavelski has also played international hockey for the United States men's national ice hockey team. He won a silver medal with them at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver. ==References== == Other websites == * *Joe Pavelski Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American ice hockey centers Category:American ice hockey right wingers Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Dallas Stars players Category:People from Wisconsin Category:San Jose Sharks players Category:United States Hockey League players
title: Joe Pavelski
